name: BatteryArchiveEntryMetadata
description: Metadata for entry in Battery Archive

properties.name: cell_id
properties.description: An identifier for the cell within the repository

properties.name: study
properties.description: The institution that generated the data

properties.name: cathode
properties.description: Active material of the positive electrode

properties.name: anode
properties.description: Active material of the negative electrode

properties.name: timeseries_url
properties.description: url to access time series data of the cell

properties.name: cycleseries_url
properties.description: url to access cycle series data of the cell

properties.name: repository_url
properties.description: url to access the repository storing the data of the cell
